domino

Class Tiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino.Tiles

  • public class Tiles
extends java.lang.Object
    The class constructor creates a new list representing the total tiles, initializes it and shuffles it and two more, one for each player, representing each hand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tiles()
      The class constructor creates a new list representing the total tiles, initializes it and shuffles it and two more, one for each player, representing each hand.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> getBotHand()
      This method returns the tiles that the bot holds.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> getPlayerHand()
      This method returns the tiles that the players holds.
      SingleTile getTile(int value)
      This method gets the desired tile.
      boolean playerFirst()
      This method checks who has the highest double tile in order to determine who plays first.
